channel.title: AlloyDB for PostgreSQL on MCP Toolbox for Databases

item.title: alloydb-create-cluster
item.description:
About

The alloydb-create-cluster tool creates a new AlloyDB for PostgreSQL cluster in a specified project and location. It is compatible with http source. This tool provisions a cluster with a private IP address within the specified VPC network.

Permissions & APIs Required: Before using, ensure the following on your GCP project:

  1. The AlloyDB API is enabled.
  2. The user or service account executing the tool has the following IAM roles:
    • roles/alloydb.admin: To create and manage the AlloyDB cluster.

The tool takes the following input parameters:
